name: Pam Lu
text:
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
|
V
- Haha I'm just really glad that they didn't kill any dogs in this film:p I do agree that Pa Kent's death was unnecessary. Clark could have gotten the dog. His foot wouldn't have gotten stuck and he could have just run to safety at normal speed. Heck, the dog was able to run to safety at normal dog speed. 
- I really like this movie's version of Lois. She's not as dumb as the other versions:p
- Weird that he was able to defeat Zod in physical combat. Zod had years if training while superman had none.
